      private void cross​(Chromosome c1, Chromosome c2, int pos, Chromosome back, int bP)
      Auxiliary method to crossover Cross the chromosomes 'c1' and 'c2' by position 'bP'
      Parameters:
      c1 - - Chromosome to cross
      c2 - - Chromosome to cross
      pos - - Position of the chromosome 'c1'
      back - - Copy of the chromosome 'c2'
      bP - - Break point
